duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to customer inquiries and provide information regarding ASH Fitness products and programs
Answer incoming calls in a professional and courteous manner
Record information in the appropriate system and provide answers to member questions
Coordinate collection of necessary information and forward documentation to Research Team when necessary
Develop effective solutions to ensure member satisfaction with the Fitness programs
Manage time to ensure calls are answered within required timeframes and conduct appropriate follow-up
Maintain strict confidentiality in all matters relating to the member experience with the Fitness program

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required
